text:
Will Silas become a big brother soon? Justin Timberlake gushed about having more children with wife Jessica Biel during an interview with Beats 1‘s Zane Lowe.

“I want to have as many kids as we can, if I’m being honest,” the “Filthy” singer, 36, said. “I’ve never felt more inept my life. You wake up and all of a sudden there’s this human being you’re responsible for.”

Related: Justin Timberlake’s Cheesy ‘NSync Days Before he was donning a Suit and Tie or bringing Sexy Back, Justin Timberlake was one part of boy band phenomenon 'N Sync

Timberlake and Biel, who tied the knot in Italy in 2012, are parents of son Silas, 2.

“Everybody tells you that your life is going to change and you’re like, ‘Whatever, I got it.’ My wife and I — when we have a night off and we get into bed and we sit down and watch a movie or something, we’re like, ‘What did we do before this? Did we go out to dinner? Were we at a bar? What did we do before this?’” he adds. “I feel like the success of parenthood is feeling like I failed all day today, but I get to wake up tomorrow and do it again … and hopefully they turn out to be a good human being.”

Related: Biggest Boy Bands of All Time Man power! Us looks back at music's most successful all-male groups, from One Direction to the Backstreet Boys

The musician named his latest album, Man of the Woods, after his baby boy. As Us Weekly previously reported, the couple have always wanted to raise him out of the spotlight.

Related: Music Video Cameos Working in film and TV just isn't enough! Check out celebrities who've made surprise appearances in music videos over the years — from Courteney Cox's classic "Dancing in the Dark" moment with Bruce Springsteen to Kylie Jenner sharing the screen with Travis Scott!

“Jessica sees herself as a mom of boys, so it worked out perfectly,” a source told Us shortly after they became first-time parents. “Justin is so excited, he doesn’t know what to do with himself!”
title: Justin Timberlake Wants ‘as Many Kids’ as He Can With Jessica Biel
